textAfterTable: Categories Comments Tips for prospective students Do your research because coppin state is not for everybody. Am enjoying being here Its ok for the most part, Its not gonna be worth it if you dont make this experience your own. Am learning a lot Coppin has alot of people who are willing to help you. Login to rate or flag the reviews Christopher from Baltimore, MD 07/07/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 4 of 30 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Coppin State University is a great school for people that don't have much money but desire a good education. The professors at Coppin are very good. Tips for prospective students There are only 2 dorm buildings right now. Try to get into Daley Hall instead
